name: Paulista Avenue
description: Paulista Avenue is one of the most famous streets in São Paulo, known for its cultural institutions, shopping centers, and business hubs.

name: Ibirapuera Park
address: Av. Pedro Álvares Cabral, São Paulo, SP
description: Ibirapuera Park is a large urban park offering museums, green spaces, and cultural events in São Paulo.

name: Municipal Market
address: Rua da Cantareira, 306, São Paulo, SP
description: Famous for its delicious mortadella sandwiches and exotic fruits, this market is a must-visit for food lovers.

name: Sé's Cathedral
address: Praça da Sé, São Paulo, SP
description: One of the largest churches in Brazil, featuring stunning Neo-Gothic architecture.

name: football's Museum
address: Praça Charles Miller, São Paulo, SP
description: A museum dedicated to Brazil’s passion for football, located inside the historic Pacaembu Stadium.

name: Batman's Alley
description: A famous alley known for its vibrant street art and graffiti by local and international artists.

name: Liberdade
description: A neighborhood with a strong Japanese influence, featuring authentic cuisine, shops, and cultural events.

name: MASP
description: One of the most important art museums in Brazil, housing an impressive collection of European and Brazilian masterpieces.
